TopicTitle: Can someone point me to a link or design of some sort?

Articles.Content: Silly yt vid. Taxi car build. Im interested in the elevator launch pad he built for his rocket. Does anyone have a craft file or link to something like that?

Craft-sharing thread moved to the craft sharing subforum. 

And sorry, but I do not have a link to that vehicle.

The link is already in the description of the video.... You know, the spacedock link. Then you have to click the .craft thing at the bottom...

No offense but was that really hard?

Edit - Wait, thats not the thing you wanted. Sorry then.

Edited November 12, 2017 by qzgy
What that looks like to me is a bit of clever editing and some Infernal Robotics parts.

12 minutes ago, Thor Wotansen said:

What that looks like to me is a bit of clever editing and some Infernal Robotics parts.

Yes. I have IR installed.

 

I couldnt get a good view of it so i cant reverse engineer based off looks. Seems like something a few people probably thought up at some point tho.

Obviously it doesnt have a lot of practicality. But still neat i think.

What I meant is, the bit with the platform is only on the top slide-o-tron thingamajig.  It actually doesn't travel the whole distance from the ground to the top.  He used clever editing to give that impression.
i do not have a ink but it is very easy to build with infernal robotics
